result.execSummary:
The defendant Sapphire S Pearson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: Repeater, PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Fine and costs to be paid $50.00 each month commencing 09/01/2022 and each month thereafter or penalty of civil judgment for non-payment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sapphire S Pearson

records.addlTxt: Letter from Atty Tapia advising the Office of the State Public Defender no longer represents Defendant.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

10:54 AM Defendant Sapphire S Pearson in court with attorney Ricardo Tapia.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern, Niki Kane, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for jury status hearing, but parties have reached a resolution.
State is in compliance with victim's rights. 
Defense acknowledges receipt of Amended Information and waives reading.  
NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.
State places offer on the record.
State notes restitution has been paid by the defendant.
Court conducts plea colloquy.

Defendant enters a guilty plea to Amended Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.
State and Defense make sentencing recommendations.
Defendant makes statement to the court.

The defendant was sentenced to the following:
JAIL:  2 days (Credit - 2 days). TIME SERVED;

RESTITUTION: $0;
FINE: $515; 
DRGOD SURCHARGE: $10; 
DNA SURCHARGE:  $200;
Defendant to provide DNA sample, within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Payment of Costs/Surcharges/Fine:  Defendant to pay $50 /month commencing 9/01/22 and each month thereafter until satisfied.  Civil judgment to be entered as penalty for non payment.
Jury trial - 12 person on August 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury status hearing on August 4, 2022 at 10:30 am.
